What Issues: You sent me the wrong book.
What could we improve: You sent me the wrong book.

What Issues: The post office delivered it to the wrong address.  It took 5 days to track it down, which wasn't your fault at all.

What could we improve: I am not alone in this opinion. As a teacher, we need more bargain items for student gifts. $1.00 books would be great again. Also the order form on the back of the flyer is a MUST. I am stuck paying tax now. Teachers can not be expected to "collect" tax from parents. I realize it is available online too, but I often have Second Language Learners that only will give me cash.

What Issues: The book box was severely torn and damaged on one side and had been extensively taped up.,My order was delivered late;
What could we improve: I have become very dissatisfied with Scholastic book clubs this year.  The changes you have made have really hurt my trying to build a classroom library.  I look for books that fit our kindergarten classroom curriculum or are classic, worthwhile books for reading to my students.  I am finding very few books that meet these issues.  Furthermore, with ordering having to be on-line now, I find it very insulting to ask teachers to give you parent email addresses.  I AM NOT ABOUT TO GIVE YOU ANY PARENT EMAIL ADDRESSES FOR ANY REASON.  If the parent chooses to do so, that is their decision and their choice.   After ordering hundreds of dollars of books in the past, I have ordered very few books because of the changes to the quality of the books you are offering.

What Issues: Tax exempt issue stated in previous question.
What could we improve: Every time I order from Scholastic I have to call after I receive the order to have the tax removed. I order for our school library and must do tax exempt. I missed doing that last time so I had to write a letter to the district explaining why I paid tax with my Pcard.  I do not understand why we cannot just get the orders tax exempt.  I have filled out all of the required information; however, I still have to make a phone call after each order.  This makes me order from other companies before Scholastic.

What Issues: Something was canceled without being notified.,My item(s) is damaged;
What could we improve: The shipping was fast but one item arrived all bent up in the box. And another item was canceled without notice or without explanation.

What Issues: Somehow one of the parents who ordered couldn’t find my name and the books went to a different teacher but to my school. We did receive the books and all was well.
Parents ordering were confused when using code
What could we improve: Confusion when ordering
Additional Comments: Choice of ordering online or with coupon and paying with cash or check made out to Scholastic.  I have been ordering for many years as a teacher since it was Troll Book Club.  This year was the most confusing!  Some ordered on another teacher’s order, therefore I lost points! Thank you for allowing me to comment.

What Issues: Order does not allow tax exemption when PO is used.  I always have to call back in to have tax taken off.  This is just one more step that I have to take.  When I purchase with a PO it is being billed to the school corporation that I work for.  We have a tax exemption number on file.  It seems that when a PO is used, an option should pop up for tax exempt number. If a tax exemption number is filled in, calculate without tax.  (Been ordering for over 10 years and this has always been a pain.)
Additional Comments: See comment on tax exempt billing.

What Issues: One of the book corners was bent inside the box.
One item out of stock if you consider that an issue--but I don't.
No problem with the delivery, but the ordering process is not as user friendly as it used to be.
What could we improve: i AM GLACD YOU HAVE REVERTED BACK TO ALLOWING US TO MAKE OUR OWN DUE DATES.  HOWEVER, YOU COULD ALSO MAKE SURE OUR " EXTRA POINT" COUPONS ARE ON OUR PAGE WHEN WE LOG IN, RATHER THAN IN A SEPARATE EMAIL.

It definitely came in a timely manner which was nice but the frustrating thing was it would say delivery today, then not show up and then it did that over and over for a few days until it finally arrived. I would rather have the date a little further out if it's unsure than telling me it will be here and not showing up.

What Issues: My order was delivered late;,Delivered well past operating hours. No option to change shipping.
What could we improve: Option to ship to home.
Additional Comments: Allow option to change shipping address.

What could we improve: better delivery guess
Delivery was delayed by UPS. Driver said "The business was closed." Attempted delivery was 1:15 pm...school is open!!!! This happens to me all of the time with Scholastic book orders! Grrr!
Additional Comments: Scholastic needs to hire a different shipper! UPS drivers don't bother to walk up to the front office doors of a school!

What could we improve: Nothing, all went well.  I was missing an item, but was quickly provided the items once I alerted the customer service department.
Additional Comments: I still do not like the new method of ordering and how my students must order online, the lack of items available in the flyers provided, the fact that most of my parents do not have credit cards, and the fact that it is just not as teacher friendly and as easy to order as before.  Also, the tax being added after is not good.  It should have just been added into the prices.  Lastly, what happened to affordable books? Nothing for a $1 or $2 anymore and the 20 books for $25 gone?  I am at a Title 1 school and Scholastic has now become very unaffordable for my demographics.

What could we improve: We ordered a diary with key and the key was not included in the package. Customer service was super helpful and reordered us the book.
Additional Comments: Customer service was easy and super helpful!

What Issues: My order is missing item(s);,I have not received a package;
What could we improve: I still haven’t received my order.

What Issues: My order is missing item(s);,I received something I didn't order;
What could we improve: One of my students received the wrong book.

What Issues: My order is missing item(s);,My item(s) is damaged;
What could we improve: one book was missing from my order and one book  was completely damaged with very sharp plastic edges from the broken plastic bubble.
i had three orders and only two came. I am missing an order for Carson Bowling. It may not have been placed in time.
Included the correct number of copies of the book I ordered.  The online chat was very helpful in correcting this and the additional copy was sent out.  Thank you for doing that!
Additional Comments: I appreciate you sending out the additional book I ordered when I reached out about the missing item.

What Issues: My order is missing item(s);,My item(s) is damaged;

What could we improve: I buy many books from Scholastic, I usually get coupons only after I place an order. Maybe you could provide a coupon at the beginning of each month and not directly after a purchase
Wrong book was sent
One of the books ordered by my students was missing.  After calling, it is being sent, but it is taking longer than expected.
did not receive all my items
I did not receive the stickers I had ordered. It notified me that they were in stock, but I have not received them.
I am missing a book. Now I need to find time to call and figure out where my missing book is. As a teacher, I do not have time. I have never had an issue before so this is really disappointing to me.
Included all of the books that were ordered. 3 kids each had 1 book missing from their order.
I received a book when I was supposed to receive valentine bracelets.
Missing items. No packing slip.

What Issues: My order is missing item(s);,I received something I didn't order;
What could we improve: There were three missing books (although they were on the packing slip) and three other books (that were not on the packing slip) in the box.
Additional Comments: I have sent an email regarding the missing books but haven't heard back yet. Normally our service is great. It was just this time.

What could we improve: There was a book missing from my order. I did not receive the book "Pluto! Not a Planet" story that I used my points for.
I had a missing book and I am guessing it was backordered? There was not a note indicated this
I am missing some books. I did not receive books for Raelynn that purchased 26$ in books.
I received the wrong book and had to reach out to get the replacement. I was not notified that the situation had been corrected and the new book just appeared.

Additional Comments: great customer service when item was missing

What could we improve: I didn't receive one of my books that I had ordered. It's hard to find the time as a teacher to have to try and get it straightened back out.
A cup I ordered was broken but was immediately reordered and replaced when I emailed.
Additional Comments: Thank you for replacing the broken item.

What could we improve: Better protected the books
One book arrived with a bent back cover

The book box was torn up; there were gouges in the box; two of the books were torn or folded over.  The children who ordered those books were VERY disappointed that they could not take their books home.
Additional Comments: I did reach out to Scholastic and asked to have the books replaced.  The customer service representative did get back to me, and the replacement books are now supposedly in transit.
This is twice that a book has come damaged in the original order. There is no packing material to keep the books from sliding around and getting crunched.

What could we improve: Box was smashed and ripped. Three of the books had a bent/wet corner.

Our order was difficult to track. The tracking number said it would be arriving on Friday but it did not show up. I wasn't notified until Tuesday that the delivery had occurred during non-business hours. Further, the order date that was listed said September of 2019. When I did receive the shipment today, the box was damaged and the book bindings of three of our books were bent/torn up at the corners. The damage is enough to effect the use of the books and I don't expect the books to last long in our classroom library before the binding falls apart.
Additional Comments: I would like to know if I am able to return the items that were damaged or receive a replacement item. Thank you!

One of the books that my student was ordered was bent & smashed by the other books in the box.  The size of the book fit perfectly in the seams of the box flaps and got crushed by the other books.  I know it was totally coincidental & accidental that it happened during shipping, but my student was so excited her book came that she was willing to take the bent book & she did not want to wait for me to contact you for a replacement.

What could we improve: One of the items received was bent. Student felt quite disappointed
One of the books that was delivered was torn.  When I sent a message to Scholatic no one replied.

Additional Comments: Staff was able to help and assist... My replacements for the damaged books are on the way.   Thank you for the speedy response.   😀

I serve a community of students and parents with limited technology and online ordering experience. I have not received any parent orders because they all prefer to bring in cash to avoid online ordering. My students are missing out on purchasing books because you have changed the purchase process to serve affluent buying families. Please bring back the ability for parents to pay cash and for teachers to enter the orders for the students.

What could we improve: I used points to order a 10 drawer unit. One of the blue drawers is cracked with a chunk of plastic out of the bottom.
Additional Comments: I appreciate that we can now set our family class due dates.

What could we improve: The board book is dented in the right hand corner
Additional Comments: Can I get a replacement for the board book?

What could we improve: one of the books was bent in the box.
One book came bent in the box.
Additional Comments: THE BERENSTAIN BEARS book is damaged.
Scholastic is sending a replacement book since one book came damaged.

What Issues: Many of the items were no longer available.
What could we improve: It is difficult to order books now with everything online.

What Issues: I received something I didn't order;
What could we improve: I did get the wrong book shipped, but the customer service was excellent in fixing the issue.

What Issues: I have not received a package;
What could we improve: I got an email saying my order would be here last Tuesday and I have yet to receive it.

What Issues: I have not received a package;
What could we improve: I got a notification the book order was shippped on January 22nd and it is the 5th of February and the books have not arrived.
Additional Comments: The shipment said for four days it was on a truck from Billings.  Not sure what was going on.

What Issues: I have not received a package;
I have not received a package;
What could we improve: The books still have not arrived

What Issues: I have not received a package;
What could we improve: I still haven't received my order

What Issues: I have not received a package;
What could we improve: I didnt receive the order.  Is there a way for you to track it and find out where it was delivered?

What Issues: I have not received a package;
What could we improve: I haven’t received my order yet. It said it would be delivered on Friday, but it wasn’t. Then I get a message saying I missed it on Saturday and they would try again tomorrow. Obviously my school will not be receiving deliveries on Sunday. I sure hope I get this order, as I never received my prior order.

What Issues: I have not received a package;
What could we improve: Change the ordering for families back to paper or online. Many of our families can’t access the online ordering due to wifi issues, no debit/credit card, etc.

What Issues: I have not received a package;
What could we improve: I received an email saying my box was going to be delivered and it still has not arrived.

What Issues: I have not received a package;
What could we improve: I haven't received the order

What Issues: I have not received a package;
What could we improve: Haven’t received my order

What Issues: I have not received a package;
What could we improve: As far as I can tell I still haven't received the package. I'm still waiting for it to arrive at my school.

What Issues: I have not received a package;
What could we improve: Ensure the package was delivered and follow up when package is lost.

What Issues: I have not received a package;
I have not received a package;
What could we improve: The box has disappeared in UPS’s hands with no updates available.

What Issues: I have not received a package;
What could we improve: My books were not ever delivered to me.
Additional Comments: Where are my books?  If they are not going to be delivered would you kindly refund my purchase amount.  Thank you.

What Issues: I have not received a package;
What could we improve: I still haven't received my books although they've been promised Tuesday, Wednesday, and today. Now I get a notice that they'll be here Saturday...our school is closed on Saturday.
Additional Comments: Can I change the delivery address?

What Issues: I have not received a package;
What could we improve: Shipping notification said that my order should have been delivered Monday and it is now Thursday and no shipment.

What Issues: I have not received a package;
What could we improve: Shipping kept getting delayed.

What Issues: Delivered to wrong address because the Scholastic system will not update the address for Rising Hill Elementary.
What could we improve: Our address at our school is 7301 NE 108th Street, NOT Terrace. Our boxes were delivered to a house nearby, and the owners had to bring us the 3 boxes. I called Scholastic to get this changed, but they told me nothing can be done.
Additional Comments: Please fix our address in your system so this issue does not continue.

What could we improve: My book club box was delivered to the wrong school site and a school employee had to go pick it up for me.

What Issues: Damaged box.  Could have easily been missing parts of order
What could we improve: Box arrived ripped open and broken

What Issues: Coupon came out after order was placed
What could we improve: I always have my book orders due on Friday of the first week of a month. At least twice this year, you have sent out a promo for the month after that date. Teachers and parents are missing out on some good benefits when those don’t come out on the 1st of the month. Please consider this!!!!!!!!!
Letting me choose die dates

Additional Comments: The CSR that assisted me was amazing

What Issues: A parent used another name - Michelle Radke. We have not received that order yet….
What could we improve: I am not sure how but one of the parents reported that they could not find my name on the list of Sand Creek teachers when using the URL…
When I was inputting my order, I didn't see where I put my student's name anymore.

Additional Comments: Scholastic used to send out book order catalogs every month. I loved this because I could send them home and have students order every month. Now we rarely get them so I rarely do book orders anymore. I've tried telling parents that book ordering online is open but without the catalogs, parents don't order. Please go back to sending them out every month.

What could we improve: The new catalogs do not have enough options. The old ones were much better. The prices went up but the selection went down.
nothing

Additional Comments: I have been ordering books from you for over 40 years I have very few parents ordering. Two issues… your order form is awful and your prices too high even for my affluent school familles

What could we improve: I’m not happy with recent changes when students are ordering through me. It’s confusing to parents and not easy to keep track.
The ordering process is simple and user friendly.
Additional Comments: I would like the monthly book order flyers to arrive at my school sooner.
I really wish you still offered $1 books monthly to parents. You would get more orders if you had that.

What could we improve: It was good. No complaints.
Additional Comments: Thank you so much for reversing course and letting me set the due date for my class. That makes a HUGE difference when making plans that fit my students, my schedule, an family needs.

What could we improve: Offer more items for teacher store

Additional Comments: Please bring back more $2 books to choose from!

What could we improve: Some of my parents don't want to order online. I have to order for them and put it on my ccd for them.
Additional Comments: I use to do the books for children monthly when they was a $1 book. The book cost has gone up so I don't do that anymore.

What could we improve: Reminder email that a parent order was pending
Do not deliver book boxes on the weekends when we do not have school. This takes the delivery even longer because it's sent back.
I buy the books with my own money.  I liked when you had $1.00 books.
Please allow children to bring their orders in.  Not all want to place their order online.
Additional Comments: Go back to the old way of ordering. It was so much better.

What could we improve: I had a credit to my account and I was saving it. Each month it goes down by 2.00. Now I have almost no credit. Why do you take money from teacher's account. That does not seem right. You need to have books in the 1.00 range. I have families that say it is too expensive to order books.
The delivery is fine.
Additional Comments: I would love to go back to the way ordering was before having to do it all online.  We have seen a big decrease in parent orders.

What could we improve: Send monthly catalogs.
Additional Comments: more 1.00 books for teacher order.

What could we improve: I can't see past orders from online ordering. On the packing slip, it only said Lane, I have 2 Lanes and they both thought it was theirs.

When I earn $10 to spend for the classroom as part of a promotion, only certain books qualify for purchase with the offer. The last couple of times, I already had most of the books that qualified in my class. More options should be available.
Additional Comments: The monthly fliers have been arriving at our school later. I prefer to send them home on the first of the month, but it’s Feb. 5 & I still haven’t received my February fliers to send home.
no

What could we improve: Prices on books are really higher.  It was hard for me to find books for my class as a Valentine gift from me and my assistant.

I like getting the flyers earlier so that I can send them home and have them shipped before the month. Example- I'd like to send home the December flyer early so the books arrive to the students before the holidays that take place in December.  I'd like the flyers for March to go home at the end of February so that the kids get their leprechaun books before St. Patrick's Day.
I preferred the old order forms where students could order in the classroom.
You folks did a nice job! Thank you!

Additional Comments: It was an easy and manageable transaction that allowed us to buy a lot of books for an upcoming event. Thank you Scholastic!

What could we improve: Inform teachers when their new account is not merged with their old account.
I filled this out the last time and did not even receive a comment so therefore what is the point
Additional Comments: Last time I had a issue with the initial order. I was unable to order the free $10.00 in books. I never even receive a response.
easy to order and check out, came quickly. Very happy with the service.

What could we improve: my catalogs don't come in time
none
Additional Comments: none
na

What could we improve: I miss the paper flyers- monthly
My orders seem to be down since the change in flyers. I had several families that preferred not to order on line.
Additional Comments: The timing of flyers seems to be off. I'd prefer to receive the flyers at the beginning of the month not mid month.

What could we improve: I order for a school with a tax exempt certificate on file, yet I have to contact you every time I order to refund the tax. My one and only complaint is that.
Bring back more $1 or $2 books so that kids can afford them
Additional Comments: Scholastics is too expensive, I'm considering not doing it anymore. Kids feel bad not being able to get books.

What could we improve: I am not sure what the reason is:  book prices, all on line ordering, or just tight budgets.  Our book orders are down 75%.
Prices way too high
Additional Comments: Bring back dollar books

What could we improve: I want to receive flyers and have had to request them recently.  I would like to order for March and April (St Patrikc's Day and Easter) ASAP.
I miss having the order forms on the flyers, so parents have the chance to order using cash. Many of my parents do not have the ability to order online with a credit card.
Send me notifications of parent orders.

Additional Comments: I like how you stopped automatically submitting parent orders on a certain date. I have not been receiving many order forms to send home. I used to get a few different forms each month now some months I do not get any.

What could we improve: Have more inexpensive books for parents to purchase and teachers to purchase.  Go back to the flyers
Additional Comments: If the cost of books remain the same as this year, I will unfortunately have to find somewhere else to spend our donated money for books.  The books are too expensive for me and most of the parents in our classroom, as we service low income families.

What could we improve: Not everyone can order onlne. I should be able to input children's orders like I used to for grandparents and other families that can not.
NA
Additional Comments: Thanks for giving teachers back control of deadlines. It was terrible when it submitted itself.

What could we improve: Allow students to order directly from teachers as they have in the past and not have to only order electronically.  It discriminates against lower income students who do not have access to technology.
Additional Comments: I want to reiterate, again, that teachers should still be able to accept orders directly from students and not have students limited to only ordering electronically.  It has limited my students' ability to order, as not all of them or their parents have the ability to order and/or pay electronically. It particularly discriminates against lower income students, who already need more help with reading.

This is the second time I offered class book orders. The first time there was no interest. This time I used an edited version of your parent letter to help the parents with the ordering process. Some of the parents ordered this time. I was really nervous about this system with only online parent orders, but it worked so I'll try again.
I love Scholastic book clubs! Thank you!

What could we improve: It is not easy to make sure you are on the teacher site vs the regular site. I accidentally started my order not on the teacher site then had to start over on the teacher site. It is also difficult to find the class code on the website.
Flyers earlier so they can be sent home at the beginning of each month.  Lost 2 months of free books because my orders were automatically sent. Not a fan of that feature.
To expense
Additional Comments: Books are too expensive

What could we improve: I have used scholastics book clubs for over 25 years. Your current updates are very challenging to get kids excited about books and for parents to order. The kids really enjoyed looking at the order forms and circling their favorites then bringing them home for their parents to order. Your new method does not allow the excitement for the kids and parents are too busy to go on the the website and search.
While my ordering process was easy my students families are still not comfortable with the new system. Orders this year have fallen way off.
more affordable books
Additional Comments: I feel that families are not ordering because they can get books from Amazon for cheaper and faster. Please add more affordable books.

What could we improve: Let the teacher be the one to order. My parents don’t have access to order online. Or they don’t understand how to order online. They still send the money to me, and I order for them. But I end up having to pay the tax. If this keeps going on like this, I will no longer be using scholastic books. Which is sad because my students like to build their library at home.

Right after I ordered, there were some other items that needed to be added. I could not go in and edit the order, so I did not order the other items. There should be a small period of time after the initial order to edit it before confirmation.

At this time, many of my colleagues and I at the middle school level are choosing to no longer send home Scholastic orders. Families are no longer interested in ordering, particularly when the same books are often available at a lower price through vendors such as Amazon. It saddens me that after years of looking forward to monthly orders as both a student and as a teacher of 33-years we are making this decision. Unfortunately, the service no longer is as relevant as it once was. During a discussion this past week, we noted that the selection of books is not the quality that it once was nor is it as expansive. I had one student accidentally select me as the teacher for their teacher, so elected to close out my bonus points. Breaking up is hard to do!
I which orders would arrive sooner
Additional Comments: Spaish books more accessible
one student ordered online but my account shows no record.As if Friday he had not received his books. Soltaz is the last name

What could we improve: Incentives for monthly purchase. Free stickers, book marks, pencils, etc would help encourage more students to purchase.
Additional Comments: More teacher and student incentives are needed to encourage and motivate more purchases. In the past free stickers, book marks, posters, books, etc.  were given to students who ordered. Now there are not incentives.

What could we improve: the ordering process went well but I am so disappointed in the price of the books anymore. I was going to buy a class set but it was over $200!

Additional Comments: My students LOVE ordering from scholastic! There is much excitement when a BOOK BOX arrives!
I am so glad Scholastic went back to letting teachers set our own due dates for our classes! :)

What could we improve: Monthly flyers and less expensive books

Additional Comments: My burning question is...do you still sell the BIG scholastic books?

What could we improve: Go back to an order form that doesn't require parents to order online. You've taken an entire population of readers out of the purchasing ability. I have socio-economic and academically challenged parents who won't use this format...but they were almost always the ones who would send in an order before-even if it was only one book that they could afford. So far this year, only my most affluent parents have ordered. It's not right. It makes me want to seek out a company who understands that books need to be in these kids hands-period!
Additional Comments: Go back to the old order form where parents could choose between online ordering or sending it to the teacher.

What could we improve: I never received orders to send home until a week before January was over.  I ordered for myself online but had nothing to send home to families until later.
Additional Comments: Parents are not responding to online only ordering.  I am not receiving order forms in a timely fashion.  Books are more expensive which also might equal less to no family orders.

What could we improve: faster delivery time

The Smencils will be great for my students as a little gift.  I have not been ordering books lately because the quality of the construction has really gone downhill.  I have Scholastic books from the 90's that are still in great shape and my students enjoy them everyday.  However, within the last 5 years I will say that the books I have gotten have only lasted a few years on my shelves before I have to tape them back together or throw them away.
Your prices have made it that most of my students can’t purchase anymore.. I understand why it had to be done, but I’m sad my students can’t get quality literature for a low price anymore.

Additional Comments: I have stopped sending out orders to my students since you took away the option for me to place the orders.  Please go back to the old way!!!

What could we improve: More options in the 1-2 dollar range
More options for ordering books
I was unaware that a parent placed an order online.  I went to go look for a book for myself and saw the order.
Better deals for sets of books...really miss the 10 for $10 sets that were available the past few years.
Additional Comments: I liked when order forms were available monthly to send home to families. I always sent them at the beginning of the month. This year they don't arrive consistently.

What could we improve: Bring back $1.00 books.
Additional Comments: Bring back $1.00 books.

What could we improve: I have to say that often I will receive the spend $10 coupon but I am unable to use it.  That has happened on many occasions throughout this year and last year.  It is disheartening and is having me rethink the effort I put into notifying parents and sending out the orders and all it entails to share Scholastic for my class.  Other things have happened as well that I have questioned where I have lost out on receiving free books that I have earned.  Is there something that can be done?  Thank you...Maurica Hash!
They usually arrive sooner, but it was fine when it arrived.
Additional Comments: I am glad you changed putting in orders on specific dates. Thank you!

What could we improve: Allow parents to order direct without my involvement. In case you haven't heard, classroom teachers are extremely busy and we really don't look forward to adding items to our plate.
Parents would like the old way of ordering books. We need more flexibility on ordering.
Additional Comments: This year, fewer books have been ordered because new way of ordering books have been more difficult for parents.

I have in the past and continue to send recommendations home attached to the monthly flyer.  However I am disappointed with the new way of ordering for parents.  I have seem a decrease in interest and families ordering.

What could we improve: Nothing as of right now.
nothing

Additional Comments: Always great to work with your company!

I wish you continued to send an envelope with the Book Flyers that you mail to teachers. I still send home a paper copy and I always have 1 or 2 parents who do not want to order online or have problems ordering on the computer and want to just send me a check. Also, when they order by check, they do not include tax, and then I have to pay the tax. Where if they order online the tax is included. When I ordered with checks in the past, we didn't pay tax??? Why has this changed? I know you prefer online orders but not every parent wants to order that way. I wouldn't want them to miss out on ordering books for their child.

What could we improve: The ordering process is simple, but the prices of the items are quite expensive for teachers trying to buy classroom sets of books for gifts and instruction.
Make signing in 1 step instead of 2

Additional Comments: The books that were substituted for one that I ordered which was out of stock were wonderful, thank you!

What could we improve: The books are so expensive. My class can NOT afford to buy them. I am also disappointed that you don’t have the $1.00 books anymore because I like to give my students books. I have 28 kids, so if I buy them each a $2.00 book, that is $56.00 plus tax.
Additional Comments: Please go back to the special offers for teachers of the $1.00 books!

I miss the dollar books and the packs of books for teachers such as a pack of 5 books for $5. I used to give my students books for the holidays but I can't anymore because the cost is too high. I also don't think that there are enough options for preschool teachers from the bonus point catalog. I do like the speed of delivery and the ease of ordering.
I’ve been very pleased with Scholastic during the 23-24 school year!

What could we improve: The flyers used to offer a better selection of books.

Additional Comments: On a few occasions the books come with crinkled covers. Perhaps you could take more care in packing the books.

What could we improve: Get rid of the automatic order submission.
Additional Comments: Customer friendly services were better in the past. Prices are much higher, now have to deal with including tax in prices, and flyers not sent on a more recent basis makes me think I may not want to continue to use Scholastic.

What could we improve: The order was placed by a parent, I had little to do with the order.

Send the January flyers out sooner than you did. I like to put the flyers with my monthly newsletter at the beginning of the month, to reference them in my newsletter and draw attention to them.  They came late this month, after my newsletter went out.
Additional Comments: I am disappointed with the lack of selections, especially more quality literature.  I have taught for many years and the selection isn't anything like it used to be.

What could we improve: I'm disappointed in the change to book orders this year.  I have been ordering Scholastic for 34 years!  I feel the quality of literature offered has declined.  The TEACHER catalog needs some new life-new items offered.

Additional Comments: You are doing a great job!👏🏻

What could we improve: More tracking… this shipment seems to be taking longer than usual.

This summer I set up a campaign so I could buy books monthly for my 22 1st graders. I based my donation request on the fact that Scholastic sold monthly $1 dollar books last year and I saw campaign information quoting that same price. I received enough donations to cover the year at the dollar price.  I understand that everything is more expensive these days and obviously this year you discontinued the $1 books. I was very disappointed though that the $2 books are few and far between. I have used all of my campaign money, bonus points  and additional personal money to buy just 4 books for my class. At the beginning of the year,  I got families excited about their child receiving a free to them book each month. And now I'm unable to provide any more books for the rest of the year. I have used and loved Scholastic for years to provide books for my classroom library. And this year I loved the idea of being able to put quality books in the hands of my students, whose parents generally cannot afford books. I had several very kind donors, who share my love of enabling kiddos to have their own books, especially as they are excited about learning to read. So in summary, I still love Scholastic, but am not overall satisfied with my experience this year.
Additional Comments: My additional comments were given in the 1st question.
The order was processed quickly and received within the time expected. Your service is wonderful and my students truly love seeing the scholasti box waiting to be opened! Thank you!

What could we improve: I have several parents that would probably order a book or two, but they are not tech savvy enough to go online or use a QR code; I miss being able to send home Club Leo order forms. Also, I only teach in Spanish, so I would really like to see some classic favorites such as Ezra Jack Keats to buy with bonus points or money. Thank you!
It seemed like it took longer to get it this time but part of that could be the postal service
I'm not sure, but are you communicating with families when an item is out of stock, or is that up to me? I got the notification when I placed an order, and didn't know what to do from there.

Additional Comments: I wish we could get order forms more often. I don't get orders each month anymore because we don't get book forms each month.

What could we improve: Allow us to place orders more than once a month with free shipping
Additional Comments: Bring back free shipping more than once a month

What could we improve: I work at a Title 1 school with a large immigrant population. Many families do not have/use computers and don't have credit cards. So they need to turn in cash/check orders. You have switched to a very classist ordering system. It's now difficult for me to know what they want to order because you took away the physical order sheet on the order magazines. You also force me to enter all my student flier orders under my teacher account. This makes it very challenging when the books arrive knowing which books go to which students. I have to take out all the physical order forms and flip through each page to know what each family ordered. You also didn't provide a pre-stamped envelope to send in checks. I'm very disappointed with your thoughtless push for online ordering. You are catering to the middle and upper class families and making things more difficult for the poor communities and the teachers that serve them.
Additional Comments: bring back easier ordering for student flier orders with cash/checks. Send teachers pre-stamped envelopes for sending in checks. Give students stickers/prizes for ordering. My students have incredibly hard lives, I'm sure you can afford to send along some stickers with their orders.
We love scholastic!

What could we improve: Faster shipping
Additional Comments: Amazon delivers faster and at similar price points. To keep up with demands, you might have to figure how to have faster delivery speeds.

What could we improve: I wanted to order use some of my points but nothing interested me in the points catalog.

Additional Comments: I wish you'd go back to what you did before. There are many families that don't use credit card, so they aren't able to order books. I don't know if you've seen a decrease in sales or not, but I have seen a huge decrease in purchases in my classroom and I believe it's twofold; lower income families and they don't like to use credit cards online.

What could we improve: Still be able to purchase books after order was delivered/keeping that month's titles still open to purchase
Nothing....everything was good.
Nothing
Additional Comments: Love books from Scholastic!
Love how easy the process is w/the online ordering!

I love Scholastic to get books in kids hands. Quick question, how come the kids who order do not get any freebies anymore? That was a fun little incentive that I miss! I also am not receiving my paper order forms. I would like 1st and second grade order forms please!!  25 of each Thank you

I always get a message that the delivery couldn’t be made and they have to try again. Is there a way to not waste fuel on a trip to an elementary school on a weekend? It seems silly to try to deliver to the school when it is closed.

What could we improve: Navigation of website
Additional Comments: Some books gave come in not perfect/new (binding was squished)

What could we improve: Spent 2-days waiting for package, delivery date Scholastic projected was not the same as the delivery date for the mail carrier service. I had a student who was leaving the country and now I have to ship her order to her new address.

Additional Comments: My class gets so excited everytime we get a new box of books from Scholastic.. thank you for everything you do!!!
As a teacher, I’d like to see more affordable books for us to buy as gifts for students without having to crowd fund. Parents are already tapped out by school fundraisers.

What could we improve: I preferred setting my own dates.
I would like to ability to set my due dates with more flexibility
I do not care for the new flyer. Some students can’t order because there is no paper order form or prices listed.
Make the website easier to operate. I have a student whose order was cancelled because it din't ship in time for holidays and the products are no longer offered.
A larger variety of books should be offered.
Additional Comments: Your order service is just not as positive as it once was. The ways teachers were able to earn points to purchase things for the classrooms has changed in that it is more difficult. The book offerings should be integrated, plentiful and of greater quality literature. I know you must change with the times, but as a teacher, I am not as enthusiastic about your service as I once was; which means we order less often.

What could we improve: Better prices
Text updates were not provided as requested

Not charging tax and including an envelope with paid postage that could have been sent in for orders that were paid with checks. As the teacher, I ended up paying for the tax and postage for our last order. Parents in my district often pay with cash or checks. I am no longer going to be giving parents this option, so parents who would prefer to send cash/checks will no longer be ordering.
Additional Comments: It seems to be taking longer to receive paper copies of order forms. I have always sent out my book order forms with my monthly newsletter at the beginning of each month. January order forms were not delivered to my school until later in the month. I still have not received order forms for February. Some of my colleges are no longer participating in book orders through Scholastic because of the complications with receiving order forms  and no longer being able to easily send in check orders (with postage paid envelopes from Scholastic).

What could we improve: Go back to having more catalogs and monthly. Parents and I end up ordering more.
Additional Comments: So disappointed in changes you've made this year. I'm a 30 year customer and ready to stop ordering!

What could we improve: I wish we had more frequent opportunities to send book orders home.

Additional Comments: Thank you for the speedy processing and delivery.

What could we improve: The post office delivery was unsatisfactory because they weren’t able to deliver to my school. They stated they would return the next day and they didn’t. After 3 days I went to the post office to retrieve my package.

Additional Comments: Please make sure all books are in great condition. On a previous order, I received a book that was damaged.

What could we improve: I like ship to home option
Not happy that there is a delivery charge
Additional Comments: You need to offer more $1 and $2 books. So many of my students can not afford higher priced books. I’d like to see you bring back the higher bonus points for technology as I’ve got bonus points to spend.
Just disappointed in the options for Bonus Point use- miss some of the higher-end technology options.   I was saving for an i pad and now it is no longer available.

What could we improve: Bring back $1 books! Offer more deals for teachers who do all the work to get orders. Don't just make it online only for parent orders. I teach in a rural district with lots of low socioeconomic families. You are shutting them out by doing that.
Additional Comments: Realize that ALL kids want books ordered. It's getting more difficult for families to order when online is the only option, or at least you make it seem that way to families.
Simple and great service.  Thank you!

I would like to see the monthly due dates and flyers back. I do not like the new due date system. It’s less orders a year and parents get confused with due dates and not getting holiday books before the holiday with the shipping date that’s set. I usually change the date to accommodate for that, however it is a long time until a next order and parents are less likely to order. I know my book orders have been very low this year compared to last year with the monthly ordering system. I also have spoken to the other teachers in my school and they feel the same way. Please go back to monthly orders and flyers!
The search feature online seems to be malfunctioning. When searching specific titles from the flyer, it produced no results. This happened for multiple books.

What could we improve: It's not you, our deliveries come to a church office so we get items later than we'd like since the office secretary is only part time.
Too confusing for my parents to figure our how to order online. I need some kind of code that directly links them to my classroom.
i don’t like not having control of setting the date because i’ll place the order and parents order after i submit and it messes up my bonus points
I liked the student order forms on the paper catalogs because not all families use credit cards.

As a classroom teacher, I always used to give every student in my class a book at the holidays. I could find books for$1 as with a classroom full of kids that can add up quickly. I’m disappointed in the selections so far this year that most of the inexpensive books are $2, $3, or $4. I see you have added many items that aren’t books.
I have been so pleased with Scholastic this year as compared to the tricky delivery issues during the COVID era. Thank you.
Additional Comments: Only question that still remains is my curiosity as to why Scholastic would like to set due dates for orders? I still set my own; just wondering.
I need more than one set of fliers for the books. I have 75 reading students. Thanks!

What could we improve: Not charge shipping for any order.

Parents are ordering without my invitation. They are going online and ordering whenever they want. I get an email notification that an order has been placed.  I have not sent a notice for them to order.
Additional Comments: I should be able to take a break from book orders.

What could we improve: I wish I could enter student orders like before

Additional Comments: I rarely receive flyers for my class and both parents and children like when they get the flyer.  Also, I would like to see a better selection of books for children to read.  Over the years it seems that the selection of books have changes and not in a good way.  The same is true of what teachers can get with bonus points.  The selection of items are not the best and the amount of points that you are asking for is way more than these items are worth.  I have been with Scholastic for many years and I have seen a big change in what is being made available for the children and I must say, it is not a change for the better.  Thank you!
It would be helpful if there was a filter to view books by price

Additional Comments: I love scholastic books and so do my students!

My students are not ordering this year like they have in the past because they do not have the flyers to take home and beg their parents. Through technology parents don’t bring it up and the kids forget.

Hi! As usual, I love Scholastic and I am grateful you support teachers and our students. I am ready to order for February but the February flyers aren't available.  (Today is February 4th.) When will flyers be available each month? Is February accidently behind?

What could we improve: Really the ordering and delivering process was great and easy.  I just wish there were more $1 or $2 books or more bulk books for 25 and more books available to order.  As a teacher I order 2 times a year personally.   I order before Christmas  because  I like to gift my students 3 to 4 books for Christmas as a gift and I order around this order to end of February  to purchase my end of year/promotion books (again another 3 to 4 books).  I like to get sets of my class number plus 1 more (in case I get an extra student) of single books they all get that are the same and the mystery bulk sets which seem to only come in 20 for my grade level which means I have to purchase more sets.  If there is a way of making book bulk packs of 25 or 26 books it would be very helpful.    I love the affordability of buying these large book packs and then looking through them to determine who gets what books based on ease to read and topics.

Additional Comments: Scholastic is the best! Thank you!

What could we improve: I prefer the previous Book Club that included a class code and the families had the option of submitting an order to the teacher with cash or check. Not all families have computer access or credit cards to use.

I used to do a monthly order and have only sent home forms twice this year. Only one student ordered each time. Please make some changes so all students can have access to quality books.

What could we improve: Quicker delivery

Additional Comments: I’d love to have the fliers for parents to send in orders again. Many of our families do not have credit cards and literally send in change. I also would love to see more $2 and under books. This is for the same reason. That’s all our families can afford.
Please bring back student order forms.  Parents do not like to use the online ordering

What could we improve: I would prefer the paper flyers.
Additional Comments: I am finding less of my students order due to no paper flyers. The paper flyers are enticing and the children show them to their parents and ask die books. The online order, doesn’t entice them as much.

What could we improve: It would have been nice to receive the flyers at the beginning of the month rather than the end of the month.  I never had a chance to give them to parents.  They just looked at their selections online since the flyers arrived after we submitted the January orders.
I miss the $1 & $2 books as I buy a book for each child in my classroom monthly. I can no longer do that.
Additional Comments: My 1st & 2nd grade colleagues no longer do book orders and I am no longer able to do so myself.
I notice that families are not purchasing many books because the prices are not as good of a value as they used to be. Families are purchasing books elsewhere at a better value.
Smooth experience, and I've been a customer for 21+ years.

What could we improve: Not bother me with surveys
Additional Comments: I don’t want two survey emails after an order. Just books. Thanks.

What could we improve: Website is confusing
I am not a fan of the new catalogs. I prefer monthly catalogs.

Additional Comments: As a teacher of 26 students, I am disappointed there is very limited affordable books I can purchase for my students. During Christmas and at the end of the year I love gifting books to my students but can no longer purchase books because of prices. I would be forever grateful if you brought the $1 books back for teachers to gift books to their students!
Love book clubs! Thank you!

What could we improve: I am finding the ordering process and website confusing this year. I had my book orders due a certain date, and submitted them the morning after. Another family member ordered something beyond that date, and when I got the email saying I had another family order, I went on to submit her order and I could not find it anywhere on the Scholastic Book Clubs website. Not under my order history, not in my cart, not anywhere on my account. It was like it didn't exist. I logged out and in again, thinking it was a glitch. Then reading on the website, it sounded as if the order had been automatically submitted based on the new protocol of if they order beyond a particular date. So I thought, well, okay. I got the email and it must have been automatically submitted. However, a week later, I logged onto the Scholastic website to set my next month's due date to find something in my cart. It was the same family order that I was under the impression had been automatically submitted since I could not find it anywhere. It was now sitting in my cart, and had been for over a week. I submitted the order right away but needed to email the family and apologize as they would now be waiting over 2-3 weeks for their order because of this. I keep thinking maybe I am misunderstanding the order parameters this year, however, it seems there have been multiple changes this year that have made Scholastic Book Club a lot more confusing to use. Thank you.

Additional Comments: Please go back to the $1 books.    Also, please go back to the monthly fliers

What could we improve: I liked it better when we got paper flyers with the due date and code on the flyers
Make the deadlines for family orders editable.
More free book coupons/stickers etc like you used to
Additional Comments: Thank you for changing the due dates for teachers to set!

What could we improve: Bring back your $1 books and more affordable book packs for teachers that are buying books for students every month.

What could we improve: Bring $1 back so teachers can afford to buy books for students
Additional Comments: Bring $1 back so teachers can afford to buy books for their students!!!!!!!!!!!

What could we improve: It’s very stressful getting my books delivered to my school. I wish that books could be delivered to the teacher home. UPS often drops books off when the school is closed and then I’m having to drive there on the weekend and after hours to get my books. This happened during Christmas. This also happened in January as our school was closed on January 26. And yes that’s the day the books were delivered. It’s always a worry that my books will get taken. And I think I’m done ordering.
Quick and easy.  Fast this time too!
Do not send paper flyers
When I have book order to send home, parents will order but just to send an email with an online link,  I don’t get very many orders.

Additional Comments: Thanks!

What could we improve: The flyers no longer come with a place to write orders. Most families still like to order by bringing in cash to the teacher. There isn’t a place to type student orders and their name, like before. It is assumed that all students will order online.
Additional Comments: Taxes are now added to orders in California. The price on the flyer should state that taxes will be added. Please fix the online portion so we can add each student’s order and calculate their portion of the tax owed. I paid my students tax for them because I didn’t know this had changed. I won’t ne riding from Scholastic until it goes back to the old way.

What could we improve: I am very disappointed that the weekly $1 books have gone away. It has really made my book sponsor program difficult and I'm afraid I won't be able to continue next year if those don't come back.

I have not been receiving catalogs at my school. I do not like the new catalog format. I also do not like being able to access the last month’s catalog as well as the upcoming catalog online. I try to plan lessons well in advance and like to be able to see what books I might be able to use in my upcoming lessons and order them in plenty of time to have them.
Lower prices
I liked when there were more flyers because it showed more choices. Online you need to know what you’re looking for.

Additional Comments: In my school community a lot of families are not able to add orders online. It would be nice to also have the option to add in for students ourselves that just want to bring in cash orders.

What could we improve: The selection/variety  of books as ready decreases. Way to many character books and less classics.
Additional Comments: I really miss the monthly book orders. Going to seasonally is disappointing.

What could we improve: Faster shipper

I have been with Scholastic for 31 years.  My parents do not order online!!!!!! When I give them a flyer then they order online. You will not send me flyers every month so I have given up and I guess scholastic is losing business.
Ordering and delivery is great. Price of books and lack of teacher bonus points has me looking elsewhere to purchase books for students and classroom.
Nothing, it was super easy
The books offered could be improved.  Most of them are part of never ending series or commercials for cartoons and movies.  Actual non fiction books are lacking.

Additional Comments: I've been a customer of Scholastic for 24 years and it has always been a part of my classroom since my first year of teaching!   Thank you for always being there for teachers and children and for helping to instill a love of reading in all of us.

What could we improve: I would like to pick my own due date for what works best for my class and students.  Prices have been raised too high resulting in only a few orders being placed.

Delivery...nothing. Overall Book Clubs...Scholastic has really declined in the past 5 years. I think it is due to three factors which are probably all related to Scholastic trying to increase profit or offset declining profit. First, the economy tightened pocketbooks...I don't know how to fix that. Secondly, the book selection has really dwindled. The catalogues are all the same--same books from order to order with few new options and way too many gimmicky "toys." I had been a gold member for as long as there has been such a thing, but students no longer are excited to order because they aren't finding a selection that entices them. I lost my gold status a couple of years ago as my student orders declined from a typical order of $300+ each month to around $30 only a couple of times a year. I'd say the third thing is that there's not much to encourage a teacher to participate any longer. For 20+ years I earned large teacher coupons so I could order books for free with student orders. There are still $10 coupons offered typically, but one can only get a single book with the prices now. In the past, there were always highly discounted titles, but now a catalogue will only have one or two and they are always the same old things. This goes for the bonus catalogue as well. Where's the technology? Over my lifetime with Scholastic, I was able to earn with bonus points enough to get a laptop, an ipad, and $300 in gift card to Target. I don't see any options like that any longer. Scholastic has sharply declined and I truly believe Scholastic has put themselves out of business in the near future with the managerial decisions they've made to cut costs. My students are no longer ordering and I am doing nothing differently than I have for the past 28 years. So something has changed with Scholastic book clubs. Trying to maintain profit levels at the expense of dooming the overall business doesn't make sense.

Additional Comments: Please bring back the previous order form.  I had to order the student order under my teacher account and paid the tax out of pocket.  I didn't pass the cost to the parents because it would be too much to calculate.

What could we improve: I miss the old way to order students books, on the back of the magazine.
Additional Comments: no
Shipping charges should not fall upon the teacher if parents don't spend enough online.  We miss the dollar books!

What could we improve: Bring back $1 books!
I would like the students to be able to send in cash for orders.
Delivery - UPS has trouble delivering during school hours
Students still need to have a way to order from the teacher, using cash, if their parents are unable to order online.
Offer more options
Additional Comments: I wish you would go back to the order form. Many parents don't like to order online. I only have a few students who order this year. In the pass more students ordered because they could pay by check, cash or online. Now they only have the online option .

I couldn't select the book I really wanted for my $10 in free books. That's never happened to me before.
Additional Comments: Bring back the bonus points catalog!

What could we improve: I don't like the new online format and the new flyers. I would like it easier to find books.
Additional Comments: Pack books better.....I had corners bent up on the smaller books being tossed around in the box during shipment.

I would like to see the Dollar books back. It would be great to have $1.00 or $2.00 books available for families to order. Most of your books are $7.00 or more. Let's get more books into children's hands. Thank you.

What could we improve: Offer multipacks of one book so my whole class receives the same book from me
Additional Comments: Please bring back the seasonal book packs of single books
I accidentally ordered a spanish book instead of an English version is there any way trade it in?

What could we improve: My parents are from low income households and will not order using a credit card. The children bring in the money to me for ordering. I am loosing money every time I order because I get charged the extra tax. Please go back to the way it was… I don’t know how much longer I will be order books from scholastic. Other teachers feel the same way in my district.
Additional Comments: Please go back to the monthly catalogs and allow children to bring in money like they used to.

What could we improve: I would like to get fliers earlier so that I can get them sent out earlier in the month. I don't have any for February.
Additional Comments: See previous comment.  It seems as though you have cut way down on the fliers being sent out.
Excellent service and products
arrived sooner than expected! Thanks

What could we improve: Parents having to order online is difficult for parents in my community

More bilingual books and dates for when books won't be available to order.  I made a list of things I wanted to order and then had to wait for the purchase order to be approved.  None of those items were available at all or for different prices.
Additional Comments: Appreciate you
Send new catalogs so they arrive by the first of that month.  My school sometimes doesn't receive them until like the 10th of the month
Would order more often if the bonus catalog that existed would return.  Not worth the trouble now.
Everything arrived in perfect condition and in a speedy manner!  Thanks Scholastic Team!

What could we improve: Very few families order now that there are no cheaper book options.
Additional Comments: Typically, I have many families that order through Scholastic without the dollar books or even two dollar books, mini families are choosing not to order at all. It would be amazing if we brought back some cheaper options for families and classrooms.

What could we improve: Envelopes made available for check orders

Additional Comments: Thanks!!

What could we improve: I placed my order on Thursday of one week and did not receive it for over a week. I live in Nebraska and in the past, I've received my packages within 3-5 calendar days from ordering.

Additional Comments: Very good service!
The class is always excited to see the book box even though only a few ordered books!  The class knows there is a new book for the classroom library inside!  Thank you!
Everything has been great!

What could we improve: My package was already partly opened when I received it

Additional Comments: Scholastic customer service has been consistently excellent and I have been using this resource for over twenty years!  Thank you for encouraging a nation of readers!

What could we improve: Have an order form as prior years

Additional Comments: My students were super excited for their orders! We can't wait to see what is coming to us next in the flyers.

What could we improve: na
Additional Comments: na

What could we improve: Much more reasonable books. The $1 books were great! Especially for a Title 1, rural, high SES school.
Additional Comments: The cost is getting exorbitant--I don't think i will be able to purchase books for the two schools I over see anymore.

I am very disappointed in the price increase in books. I am also disappointed with the order forms. I received more parent orders when they could order on the form and the books were cheaper. My families are low income and can not afford your high cost. I also purchased two books for everyone of my students. I can no longer do this because of your prices. This breaks my heart.

What could we improve: Go back to the old flyers and let the teacher chose the due date. Parents are not ordering since it is inconvient.
Additional Comments: Please go back to the old flyers. There were more choices and the teacher should pick the due date.

My only suggestion would be for Scholastic to make sure they have plenty of the most popular books in stock.  Ms. Swift is trending right now and the Swifties want to own her biography.  They were very disappointed to see it was out of stock.

What could we improve: Allow my students to pay with cash directly to me. I'm still getting some students who give me cash even though I told them it was online so I feel guilty and pay the tax for them.
Additional Comments: Go back to the old way of ordering, please.

What could we improve: families do not like the online only ordering
Additional Comments: Please get rid of the online only ordering for families, the families do not like it

What could we improve: shipping seems to take a very long time
Looking for more of a selection of books to choose from.

Additional Comments: Nope.
I LOVE our scholastic books and so do my kiddos!!!

What could we improve: I've been using Scholastic for over 15 years. You used to have $1 book every month. I understand that prices have increased on many things but it would be really nice to have a cheap book every month for families to buy.
Additional Comments: Another comment would be, you send too many emails. I don't need so many emails about the same thing. I understand you are a business trying to make money but it does turn many parents away after a few months to no longer ordering from you. I get the most orders in the beginning of the year in their first year in preschool. Then I get complains from parents from the number of sales emails from you. I rarely have parents order anything in their 2nd year of preschool.

What could we improve: You say the order has arrived but I do not have the book box order

Additional Comments: It was a parent order, so I am only responding on behalf of the delivery.

What could we improve: There was some confusion as to how to use $10 bonus that I earned so that it wasn't going to charge me shipping since my teacher order was under 25+ dollars (but student order was 50-10+ dollars. I eventually figured it out.
A student received the wrong book. Instead of Spy Dog, they received a Dragonzball book.
Shipping times seem to always be longer than expected.
Additional Comments: Thank you for providing affordable books to students. I really appreciate earning points that I can use to provide books to my classroom as well.

What could we improve: Improve the book selection.  Parents, and I agree, have said they don't really like the new format of the book order forms.  No one ordered this month and orders overall have dropped significantly this year.
Prices are too high. Parents aren't ordering books anymore due to the high prices.
Additional Comments: Lower your prices.
I wish there were more book options!

What could we improve: Offer more affordable books for teachers and parents to purchase.  I used to purchase dollar books for my students every month.  Now, I can only find them every couple of months.
Prices have gone up so much that very few families were able to order.

Additional Comments: I love this company. Thank you

Please bring back the club leo fliers.  Also bring back teacher ordering for students as not all families have credit cards to place an order online.  You are missing a big population of students who could greatly benefit from ordering books but are unable to due to your policy changes.  Also bring back better points options for teachers. You have taken away many technology resources I have been saving up for that I could use in my classroom. Scholastic has gone down hill this year which is disappointing.

What could we improve: I think you should send flyers a few weeks sooner than you do, before the month starts vs in the middle.
Additional Comments: I had a problem with an order in November when they tried to deliver on a weekend, which was odd.

What could we improve: The magazines seem to have less choice in the past. I wish they had more options for books.

Additional Comments: Thank you so much.
Very quick turn around!!!
The ordering is so easy to complete and all books come very quickly.  Thank you for your service. Would love to see the $1.00 book selection come back!

What could we improve: Allow students to bring money to the teacher to order and NOT charge tax!!
Additional Comments: I work in a low socio-economic community where it is difficult for many parents to order online due to lack of a credit card, lack of internet, etc.  In the past, I was always able to order for my students without having to pay additional tax.  Prices in the flyer should include tax so parents know exactly how much cash to send in.  This year, I've had the LEAST amount of book orders.  To help out, I offered to order as I've always done in the past.  Please go back to how it used to be.
loved the custom order date it really helped our tiny school

What could we improve: I feel like over the years, the quality of the books being offered has gone down hill.
Additional Comments: I have decided for the rest of this year to discontinue using Scholastic.  Save the paper and do not send me the order forms any longer.
I really want you to bring back the special Judy Newman books or !$1 books!

What could we improve: The box was ruined when it arrived.
Faster delivery
Nothing

Additional Comments: Great customer service!

What could we improve: Offer promos consistant with no matter however many orders you place instead of just one per cycle.
